content.body: zcorpan: did you check what happens with `git blame --ignore-rev <that-change>`? I wonder if that works well if we should also add some historical Hixie reformatting revisions to such a file and then hopefully https://searchfox.org respects that and makes blame even more useful.
content.formatted_body: zcorpan: did you check what happens with git blame --ignore-rev <that-change>? I wonder if that works well if we should also add some historical Hixie reformatting revisions to such a file and then hopefully https://searchfox.org respects that and makes blame even more useful.
